author: m.kalinin
content: I think speccing out ExecutionEngine could be used in EL tests too, but not sure if EL clients have the same set of functions as the ExecutionEngine abstraction. What are the zk use cases?

author: kevaundray
content: For zk, we want to prove the EL STF plus any other checks on the block that the CL needs to do — for example this includes checking the version hashes (something that the core EL STF doesn’t do)
